Reference

Available data

Reference and template dataset included in the package.

chr_coordinates_hg19

Coordinates for hg19 chromosomes.

chr_coordinates_GRCh38

Coordinates for GRCh38 chromosomes.

DriverDBv3

Driver mutations released with the DriverDBv3 database http://driverdb.tms.cmu.edu.tw/

example_dataset_CNAqc

Example CNAqc dataset.

Data processing

Functions to visualise the data.

annotate_drivers()

Title

init()

Create a CNAqc object.

inspect_segment()

Plot the VAF of a set of segments

get_drivers()

Extract driver data.

plot_segment_size_distribution()

Plot the segments' size distribution.

plot_karyotypes()

Plot a barplot for the segments.

plot_data_histogram()

Plot the data histogram.

plot_gw_counts()

Plot a genome-wide histogram of mutation counts.

plot_gw_depth()

Plot a genome-wide scatter plot of coverage.

plot_gw_vaf()

Plot a genome-wide scatter plot of VAF

plot_segments()

Plot CNA segments.

plot_multisample_CNA()

Plots CNA for multiple samples.

plot_icon_CNA()

Plot icon for these segments.

subsample()

Randomly subsample a dataset's mutations.

subset_by_segment_karyotype()

Subset calls by segments' karyotype.

subset_by_segment_totalcn()

Subset calls by segments total copy number

subset_by_minimum_CCF()

Title

subset_snvs()

Retain only SNVs.

print(<cnaqc>)

Print for class 'cnaqc'.

plot(<cnaqc>)

Plot for class 'cnaqc'.

Purity and ploidy QC

Analysis of CNA calls by peak detection.

analyze_peaks()

Analyze CNA calls by peak detection.

plot_peaks_analysis()

Plot the results of peak analysis.

plot_qc()

Plot a summary of QC results.

CCF estimation

Computation of Cancer Cell Fractions data.

compute_CCF()

Compute CCF values for the available mutations.

CCF()

Return the available mutation CCF estimates in the data.

plot_CCF()

Plot the CCF estimates in the data.

plot_gw_ccf()

Plot a genome-wide scatter plot of VAF

Smoothing

Analysis and plotting functions to smooth segments.

smooth_segments()

Smooth copy number segments.

plot_smoothing()

Plot smoothed segments data

Overfragmentation detection

Analysis and plotting functions to smooth segments.

detect_arm_overfragmentation()

Determines fragmentation of copy number segments

plot_arm_fragmentation()

Plot patterns of arm level fragmentation.
